content: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Walgreens Boots Alliance has at least salvaged something from the wreckage of its deal to buy rival U.S. drugstore chain Rite Aid. After antitrust pushback on the full-strength $9.4 billion deal  Walgreens has abandoned it and is instead buying over 2 000 of Rite Aid's stores for $5.2 billion. For Chief Executive Officer Stefano Pessina  doing about half the deal with half the benefits is something – but it's a modest return on at least 20 months' work.
name: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc
title: Walgreens salvages mild boost from intense effort

content: April 21 Walgreen Co agreed to pay $500 000 and reform its advertising practices to settle allegations its Walgreens and Duane Reade stores in New York routinely overcharged consumers and tricked them into thinking they were getting great deals.

content: Walgreen Co should be held in contempt and fined for its persistent failure to remove expired price tags from store shelves  a practice that deceives consumers  causes overcharges and violates a 2014 settlement  Missouri's attorney general said.
name: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc

content: NEW YORK  July 9 Walgreen Co has reached a $22.4 million settlement with the New York attorney general resolving claims that a unit improperly billed the government for reimbursement for a pediatric drug.
name: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc
title: Walgreen to pay $22.4 million in N.Y. Medicaid improper billing case

content: June 25 Drugstore operator Rite Aid Corp's  shareholders on Thursday voted to change the terms of payment for its chief executive's golden parachute  supporting a union-backed investor group over the company's board.
name: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc
title: Rite Aid shareholders vote to limit CEO's golden parachute

content: NEW YORK  June 29 Walgreen Co will pay $2.55 million to settle charges by New York's attorney general that a pharmacy unit improperly billed Medicaid for costly drugs to treat hemophilia patients  without proof that it actually delivered the drugs to those patients.
name: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc
title: Walgreen settles Medicaid false billing case in New York

content: CHICAGO  April 15 Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc  will continue to freeze salary increases for senior U.S. executives as part of plans to cut costs by more than $1 billion over three years  the drugstore chain said on Wednesday.
name: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc
title: Walgreens continues pay hike freeze for senior U.S. executives

content: Drugstore operator Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc  on Thursday reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit and said it would widen its cost-cutting program  sending its shares higher. | Video
name: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc
title: Walgreens profit beats expectations; more cost cuts planned

content: April 9 Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc  reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit and said it would close about 200 stores in the United States under a cost-cutting program that would help it save $1.5 billion by the end of fiscal 2017.
name: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc
title: Walgreens profit beats Street  drug chain to close 200 US stores

content: Feb 12 Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc  Wal-Mart Stores Inc  GNC Holdings Inc and Target Corp agreed to remove certain dietary supplements off their shelves in New York after receiving a threat of legal action from the state's attorney general  the New York Times reported.
name: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc
title: Four retailers pull some dietary aids off shelves after probe -NYT

content: Jan 6 Walgreen Co  the largest U.S. pharmacy chain  reported a better-than-expected jump in December comparable store sales  helped by the month containing one more Wednesday and one fewer Sunday than a year ago and higher sales of flu medicine.
name: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc
title: Walgreens December same-store sales beat estimates
